task.title: Starting a group chat
task.shortdesc: You can start a chat with a group that is part of your contacts.

step.cmd: Click the menu icon ( ) in the navigator and select Contacts.
Locate the group that you want to change name.
Click the menu icon next to the persons name and click Start New Group Chat.
In the Search for invitees field, enter the first few letters of the name.
step.info: Click the name that you want to invite from the list of matching contacts. Repeat to add others to the Invitees list.

step.cmd: Click Create and an invite is sent to the list of invitees. The recipients are added to the chat when they accept the invitation.
